Title: Comment on "solubility Measurement and Thermodynamic Modeling of N-(4-Methylphenyl- Z-3-chloro-2-(phenylthio)propenamide in 12 Pure Solvents at Temperatures Ranging from 278.15 to 318.15 K"
Abstract: © 2018 American Chemical Society.The calculated modified Apelblat model curve-fit parameters reported in the paper by de Souza and co-workers were found not to describe the observed solubility data. Our back-calculated solubilities differed significantly from the experimental data given in the authors' published paper. The experimental solubility data are reanalyzed in accordance with the modified Apelblat model, and the curve-fit parameters are recalculated.
